Name: Mycorrhiza
About the game: Welcome to a world of distorted minds Mycorrhiza is a love letter to horror manga in the form of a visual novel. Some of our biggest inspirations include the works of Junji Ito and Masaaki Nakayama. While Scott is trying to find a way back home, reality distorts and peopleâ€™s morals start shifting in cruel and unexpected ways. A peculiar plant transforming animals, a horrifying comedy trend and a strange building trapping people. Each of the three arcs explores different terrors. As you explore this terrifying world, you'll find out more and more about how and why Scott is trapped in it and what lead up to Scott being spirited away. Join us on our adventure into despair. Three individual, yet interconnected horrifying stories. Writing and art inspired by horror manga's greatest. Animated CGs. Art drawn by a horror manga artist. Elaborate audio implementation. Accessibility options such as visual audio cues and dyslexic font.
